noun.description: Any plant that grows along the ground, around another plant, or up a wall by means of extending stems or branches.
Any of a number of small birds that creep around in trees or vegetation.
A person whose behavior toward or interest in someone is regarded as unwelcome and socially inappropriate (typically used of a man)
examples: I could dance there without a creeper walking up and accosting me

noun.description: A low, wheeled platform on which a mechanic lies while working on the underside of a motor vehicle.
